data.title: User Experience Research and Usability Testing
data.meta_description: Situated Research conducts usability and user-experience (UX) testing for software, video games, and websites in Naperville, Illinois, in suburban Chicago.
data.text:
Creative UX research solutions, delivered

We'll help you build the best user experience (UX) for your product, so it's memorable for the right reasons. View UX Services

Creative research services to help you design the ultimate user experience

Plan your project

Incorporate user research into project planning for the ultimate user experience.

Design-based research

Use design-based research to improve your product’s design and satisfy users.

Refine your product

Refine your product’s design to make your product more effective and user-friendly.

Cloud-Based Usability Research

Research how people use your products, in-situ, to create the ultimate user experience. It’s that easy.

Clients Love Us

Your usability report was very insightful and helpful for our team to understand the usability behind our website. Thank you again and we look forward to working with you.

Jeff Bauer Forbes

Featured Work

We strive to exceed our client’s expectations on each and every project.

Happy Clients
